_examples.MICRODATA: This example is JSON only.
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
This example shows a JSON-LD description of services that do not necessarily have a direct
human-oriented HTML description. It describes a GovernmentService named "Veterans Affairs Emergency Mental Health",
its operator, service area and service details, such as its Veterans Crisis Line (including  phone contact line
hours of operation, language and other details).
_examples.RDFA: This example is JSON only.

including US toll-free numbers, a hearing-impaired number, and several contact categories.

_pRange.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient blind copied on a message.
_pRange.rdfs:label: bccRecipient

_pRange.descriptionZh: 消息的抄送收信人，这些人的名字可以被其他收信人看到
_pRange.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient copied on a message.
_pRange.rdfs:label: ccRecipient

_pRange.rdfs:comment: A contact point for a person or organization.
_pRange.rdfs:label: contactPoint

_pRange.descriptionZh: 个人或组织的联络点。（拼写的单数形式，contactPoint）。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: A contact point for a person or organization.
_pRange.rdfs:label: contactPoints

_pRange.descriptionZh: 获得此许可的人员，组织，联络人或受众。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The person, organization, contact point, or audience that has been granted this permission.
_pRange.rdfs:label: grantee

_pRange.rdfs:comment: A contact location for a person's residence.
_pRange.rdfs:label: homeLocation

_pRange.descriptionZh: 参与者的子属性。 在行动接收端的参与者。
_pRange.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.
_pRange.rdfs:label: recipient

_pRange.descriptionZh: 用来接通服务的电话号码
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The phone number to use to access the service.
_pRange.rdfs:label: servicePhone

_pRange.descriptionZh: 可以通过发送短讯访问服务的号码
_pRange.rdfs:comment: The number to access the service by text message.
_pRange.rdfs:label: serviceSmsNumber

_pRange.rdfs:label: toRecipient

_pRange.descriptionZh: 此人工作场所的所在地
_pRange.rdfs:comment: A contact location for a person's place of work.
_pRange.rdfs:label: workLocation

_properties.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.
_properties.rdfs:label: areaServed

_examples.JSON: This example is in microdata only.
_examples.MICRODATA:
ACME Hotel Innsbruck
  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.
  We speak:
  
    
      English
    
    
      German
_examples.PRE-MARKUP: This example is in microdata only.
_examples.RDFA: This example is in microdata only.

_examples.MICRODATA:
Neuschwanstein Castle
	It is a nineteenth-century Romanesque Revival palace in
		
			Schwangau, in
			Germany.
		
	
	Guided tours in
		
			German
		 and
		
			English.
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
Neuschwanstein Castle
Neuschwanstein Castle is a nineteenth-century Romanesque Revival palace in Schwangau, in southwest Bavaria, Germany.
Guided tours in German and English.
_examples.RDFA:
Neuschwanstein Castle
	It is a nineteenth-century Romanesque Revival palace in
		
			Schwangau, in
			Germany.
		
	
	Guided tours in
		
			German
		 and
		
			English.

_properties.rdfs:comment: A language someone may use with or at the item, service or place. Please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard. See also inLanguage
_properties.rdfs:label: availableLanguage

_properties.descriptionZh: 该联络点提供的选项（例如免费电话号码或对听力受损呼叫者的支持）。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An option available on this contact point (e.g. a toll-free number or support for hearing-impaired callers).
_properties.rdfs:label: contactOption

_properties.descriptionZh: 为了不同的目的，个人或组织可以有不同的接触点。例如，销售联络点，公关联络点等。此属性用于指定联系人的种类。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A person or organization can have different contact points, for different purposes. For example, a sales contact point, a PR contact point and so on. This property is used to specify the kind of contact point.
_properties.rdfs:label: contactType

_properties.descriptionZh: 该服务或联系人可用的时间。

_properties.descriptionZh: 跟此支持接触点联系的产品或服务（例如对某产品的产品支持）。这可以是明确的产品或产品系列（例："iPhone"），或者是更广泛的产品类别（例：“智能手机”)。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The product or service this support contact point is related to (such as product support for a particular product line). This can be a specific product or product line (e.g. "iPhone") or a general category of products or services (e.g. "smartphones").
_properties.rdfs:label: productSupported

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个附加类型， 通常用于从外部词典中向微数据语法添加更加具体的类型。它表示事物和事物本身所属的类之间的关系。在RDFa语法中, 对多类型最好使用‘typeof’属性这样的本地RDFa语法. Schema.org 工具对额外类型的理解较弱，特别是外部定义的额外类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
_properties.rdfs:label: additionalType

_properties.rdfs:comment: An alias for the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: alternateName

_properties.rdfs:comment: A description of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: description

_examples.MICRODATA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.
_examples.PRE-MARKUP: George Bush, the 41st President of the United States is the father of George W. Bush, the 43rd President of the United States.
_examples.RDFA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_properties.descriptionZh: 描述的子属性。 用于消除与其他类似项之间歧义的简短描述。 其它属性（特别是名称）的信息对于消歧义可能是必要的。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
_properties.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.
_properties.rdfs:label: identifier

_examples.MICRODATA:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
  By John Smith,
  May 8, 2009
  
  This classic banana bread recipe comes
  from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice texture and flavor to the banana
  bread.
  Prep Time: 15 minutes
  Cook time: 1 hour
  Yield: 1 loaf
  Tags: Low fat
  
    Nutrition facts:
    240 calories,
    9 grams fat
  
  Ingredients:
  - 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
  - 1 egg
  - 3/4 cup of sugar
  ...
  Instructions:
  
  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add
  the flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
  
  140 comments:
  
    
    
  
  From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
  ...
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:

This classic banana bread recipe comes from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice

Yield: 1 loaf
Tags: Low fat
Nutrition facts:
240 calories, 9 grams fat
Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
- 1 egg
- 3/4 cup of sugar
...
Instructions:
 Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add the
 flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
140 comments:
From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
...

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示这个东西是描述的主要实体的页面
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.
_properties.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage

_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: name

_properties.descriptionZh: 潜在的与之搭配的动作，它描述了一个理想化的动作，在这个动作中，这个东西会起到“对象”的作用。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
_properties.rdfs:label: potentialAction

_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
_properties.rdfs:label: sameAs

_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: url

_pTree.rdfs:comment: The most generic type of item.
_pTree.rdfs:label: Thing

descriptionZh: 联系方式 - 例如客户投诉部门

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 服务或产品所覆盖的区域。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: areaServed

_examples.MICRODATA:
Neuschwanstein Castle
	It is a nineteenth-century Romanesque Revival palace in
		
			Schwangau, in
			Germany.
		
	
	Guided tours in
		
			German
		 and
		
			English.
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
Neuschwanstein Castle
Neuschwanstein Castle is a nineteenth-century Romanesque Revival palace in Schwangau, in southwest Bavaria, Germany.
Guided tours in German and English.
_examples.RDFA:

	It is a nineteenth-century Romanesque Revival palace in

isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: A language someone may use with or at the item, service or place. Please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard. See also inLanguage
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: availableLanguage

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 该联络点提供的选项（例如免费电话号码或对听力受损呼叫者的支持）。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: An option available on this contact point (e.g. a toll-free number or support for hearing-impaired callers).
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: contactOption

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 为了不同的目的，个人或组织可以有不同的接触点。例如，销售联络点，公关联络点等。此属性用于指定联系人的种类。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: A person or organization can have different contact points, for different purposes. For example, a sales contact point, a PR contact point and so on. This property is used to specify the kind of contact point.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: contactType

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 该服务或联系人可用的时间。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The hours during which this service or contact is available.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: hoursAvailable

isDomainOf.descriptionZh: 跟此支持接触点联系的产品或服务（例如对某产品的产品支持）。这可以是明确的产品或产品系列（例："iPhone"），或者是更广泛的产品类别（例：“智能手机”)。
isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The product or service this support contact point is related to (such as product support for a particular product line). This can be a specific product or product line (e.g. "iPhone") or a general category of products or services (e.g. "smartphones").
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: productSupported

isDomainOf.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where the service is provided.
isDomainOf.rdfs:label: serviceArea

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 消息的抄送收信人，这些人的名字可以被其他收信人看到
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient copied on a message.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: ccRecipient

isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: A contact point for a person or organization.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: contactPoint

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 个人或组织的联络点。（拼写的单数形式，contactPoint）。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: A contact point for a person or organization.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: contactPoints

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 获得此许可的人员，组织，联络人或受众。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The person, organization, contact point, or audience that has been granted this permission.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: grantee

isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: A contact location for a person's residence.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: homeLocation

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 参与者的子属性。 在行动接收端的参与者。
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: recipient

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 用来接通服务的电话号码
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The phone number to use to access the service.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: servicePhone

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 可以通过发送短讯访问服务的号码
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: The number to access the service by text message.
isRangeOf.rdfs:label: serviceSmsNumber

isRangeOf.rdfs:label: toRecipient

isRangeOf.descriptionZh: 此人工作场所的所在地
isRangeOf.rdfs:comment: A contact location for a person's place of work.
